snippet: New research that questions the value of regular screening for breast cancer seems bound to produce public confusion and anger.
abstract: New research that questions the value of regular screening for breast cancer is bound to sow confusion and perhaps anger among women; annual mammogram has been promoted vociferously and continuously for decades as an essential tool for protection against breast cancer.
lead_paragraph: New research that questions the value of regular screening for breast cancer seems bound to produce public confusion and anger.

headline.main: For Women, a More Complicated Choice on Mammograms
headline.print_headline: For Women, a More Complicated Choice
